alert.note: Alert for Admiralty Island; City and Borough of Sitka; Western Kupreanof and Kuiu Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 25 at 4:59AM AKST until February 25 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: The surface low is tracking SE and inland over southern Baranof Island early Saturday morning. Periods of moderate snow continues on the NE and SE quadrants of the low, but has largely cleared on the west side with scattered snow showers. Snow continues to be dry and powdery. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AKST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. * WHERE...City and Borough of Sitka, Admiralty Island and Western Kupreanof Island and Kuiu Island. * WHEN...Until 9 AM AKST this morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult due to reduced visibility and blowing snow. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Rates expected to decrease quickly Saturday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Admiralty Island; City and Borough of Sitka; Western Kupreanof and Kuiu Island
